## FileTree.FsFileTreeAccessors class

Implementation of [IFileTreeAccessors](./ts-utils.filetree.ifiletreeaccessors.md) that uses the file system to access files and directories.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FsFileTreeAccessors implements IFileTreeAccessors 
```
**Implements:** [IFileTreeAccessors](./ts-utils.filetree.ifiletreeaccessors.md)
